The City of Pearsall aims for the City of Pearsall to be a clean, safe, vibrant and inclusive community which provides residents and businesses a high quality of life and that all are proud to call “home”. Pearsall is a welcoming community which maintains traditional values and develops human relationships while embracing unity, trust, integrity, and transparency. Learn more about the Council's vision and goals .

Contact

To send correspondence, please use the following address: City Hall C / O [please address to individual council member] 215 S Ash Street Pearsall, TX 78061 To leave a message via phone, call 830-334-4160.
